ingredients.@value: ¼ cup flour mixed with salt and pepper
1 orange, peeled and chopped the way you want

recipeInstructions.@value: Lightly dredge fillets in seasoned flour, shaking off the excess. Brown tilapia in a heated skillet 3 to 5 minutes per side until fish flakes easily. Add the cooked fish to an ovenproof platter and and place in warm oven.
Remove fish from oven and pour the orange mix over. Serve immediately.
Add shallots to same skillet that you used for fish and cook for 5 minutes.
Add bell pepper and stir to mix. Add orange pieces and cook, stirring for about 3 minutes but not too much or the oranges will break apart.
